"Peppy Rappy": "Xitrae"
"Yo! Do you like Rappies?!"
"Me? I love 'em!"
"...Ah, sorry. Can't believe I got ahead of myself like that."
"Allow me to introduce myself. I'm Peppy Rappy, and I love Rappies like any big brother would."
"Hear me out!"
"Recently, a huge number of Rappies have appeared around Halpha, and a bunch of different kinds at that!"
"I'd like to ask you to look into this. Like, how many Rappies are we talking about here?!"
"It's a truly challenging mission for only the biggest Rappy fans!"
"However, I believe it's possible for someone as accomplished as you are."
"Let me see your love for Rappies!"
"Hey, looks pretty good to me! Nothing out of the ordinary from what I could see."
"You just might be able to fulfill my true hopes."
"In reality, certain research data actually predicted this influx of Rappy activity would happen."
"It's said that, in response to this, a certain area will appear..."
"An area where Rappies gather. A Rappy Assembly!"
"What's more, the King of Rappies will appear there!"
"If true, what a discovery that would be. I absolutely must see it with my own eyes!"
"However, the Rappy Assembly can only appear in a safe place."
"I doubt Rappies would gather in dangerous areas where Dread Enemies are roaming around."
"So first, I'd like you to clear out some enemies until the area is safe, and then look for this Rappy Assembly!"
"I would go out and look for the place myself, but I'm currently swamped with work, so I can't leave this area at the moment."
"I can trust you with my dream. I'm counting on you."
"You're back. Thank you so much for finding the Rappy Assembly."
"You were the one to finally achieve this long-standing desire of mine. Thank you, <%me>."
"...Alas, I daresay I need more. There are still so many Rappy mysteries that need solving."
"You've encountered a Ceremo Greatrappy, no?"
"Among Ceremo Rappies, it is not unlike a king of kings."
"Before now, it was only spoken of in legend, but with such a huge influx of Rappies like this, nothing would surprise me at this point!"
"If you encounter this Ceremo Greatrappy, I'd like you to let me know."
"This could be our one chance to be able to find one! Thanks in advance."
"I believe our love of Rappies can make miracles occur, I really believe that."
"...Welcome back. I couldn't possibly have asked for a better time."
"Thank you for entertaining my selfish requests."
"I want to show you my thanks somehow. If there's anything you want, you let me know what it is."
"If it's within my power to do, I'll see it done."
"Test, test! Can you hear me? Are you <%me>?"
"Test, test! Can you hear me? Xitrae the Quartermaster here. It's been a while!"
"Sorry for calling you out of the blue like this. My name is Xitrae, I'm a quartermaster with ARKS."
"So I heard my bos-- Er, Peppy Rappy had you running errands for him."
